rules_text:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature dies, return Alabaster Halo to the battlefield transformed under your control.
rules_text2:
Flying, vigilance
Whenever Alabaster Avenger attacks, if it's enchanted or equipped, it gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text2: [i]Guide to the Blessed Sleep, condemner of the unhallowed dead.[/i]
